teacher_info.intro:
Hi to everybody who is interested in languages!
I’m Pauline from Ukraine and I’m professional teacher of French, Russian and Ukrainian languages. At the same time I’m actress and designer. Yes, I’m many-sided person ))
It’s a big pleasure for me to share my experience and knowledge with you, to help you reaching your goals, to understand your needs, to improve your skills.
About me: I’m really interested, of course, in languages, books, music, cinema, theatre, design.
And I’d like to inspire you with my favorite quote: Fortunately, languages are like musical instruments: the more you know them, the easier it is to learn a new one.
I’m really sure we will find our common points of contact.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I've been teaching the languages since 2004 and over the years I developed my own methods, created a lot of materials which allowed me to teach to students of any level and with different goals, preferences and needs.
I will try to create a relaxed atmosphere so you can feel at ease and have fun while learning. I usually conduct my lessons in French (Russian or Ukrainian) as much as I can, but I can also use English if you like.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
During our lessons, you’ll get a concentrated cocktail of phonetics, grammar, vocabulary, listening, reading and conversation.
We’ll study and practice the reading rules and put your pronunciation. After all, the ability to read a word is 50% that you know it.
You’ll receive grammar explanations followed by practical application.
We’ll work with thematic vocabulary through texts, audio, video and dialogues. Whatever your level, we’ll be able to discuss literature, psychology, cinema, theater, music, fashion or any other area of your interests.
Don’t ever be afraid of mistakes, because they make our life funny and spicier. And homework… you’ll get it if you like ))

pro_course_detail.title: [30, 45, 55min lessons] Russian Alphabet, Rules of Reading, Phonetics, Pronunciation, Intonational Constructions, Accent Reduction (Beginner/Intermediate/Proficient)
pro_course_detail.description:
Build a good solid basis in Russian! Learn how to hear, pronounce and read Russian!

DEAR STUDENTS, PLEASE NOTE:
1 hour lesson length = 55 MINUTES
I check homework assignments with you in class.


Are you not satisfied with your Russian pronunciation?
Are you a beginner and you would like to learn how to read and properly pronounce Russian words, to make sure that other people understand you? 
Or you are an advanced learner, a professional translator or a philologist and want to master the Russian pronunciation at the highest level?
Feel free to take this course!

This course will help you to achieve your goals, you will learn the correct Russian pronunciation and start hearing and distinguishing Russian sounds as well.

This course is for both - beginners and advanced students in Russian.

We are going to study and polish:
- The Russian alphabet
- The articulation of Russian sounds
- The rules of reading
- The stress in Russian words and the principles of the reduction of vowels
- The opposition of Hard and Soft consonants
- The opposition of Voiced and Unvoiced consonants
- 4 basic + 3 additional intonational constructions in Russian

Feel free to check my video on the Russian alphabet and see you at the lessons!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E_bGRY1w12A

pro_course_detail.title: [30,45,55 and 85min lessons] Russian A1 - C2 (optional preparation for the TORFL exams)
pro_course_detail.description:
DEAR STUDENTS, PLEASE NOTE:
1 hour lesson length = 55 MINUTES
1,5 hour lesson length = 85 MINUTES
I check homework assignments with you in class.

Go from zero to hero with my Russian A1 – C2 course!
Are you an intermediate or advanced student? I will help you progress faster!
Are you a beginner and don’t know where to start? Is grammar intimidating to you? I’ve been there! This course will fit students of all levels. Start improving your Russian from day 1!

About myself:
I am both a language teacher and a language learner. I’ve been doing well in both areas. As for my teacher credentials, I had years of language exchange experience which taught me that Russian and Russian for foreigners are two completely different fields. So I chose to become a professional teacher and studied at the Moscow State University Russian Language Center. I was taught by arguably the best teachers in the country who shared their valuable experience with us. Thus I can easily guide you through the TORFL standards and will save you from many mistakes beginners make by using low quality/simplified materials that don’t meet TORFL standards.
I have extensive teaching experience.
I am a successful language learner myself who attained the C2 level in English,  and who perfectly understands the student's needs.

About the course:
I am flexible and I will adapt my lessons to your needs. I use Google documents for clear and convenient grammar explanation.

There can be 2 strategies in terms of frequency of lessons. We can have intensive everyday lessons, or we can have lessons once a week or so and I can play the role of a guide for you. 

There can also be 2 styles of structuring our course. We can improvise and I can teach you different areas of the language that I see need improvement as we go, OR we can use a textbook and follow it, if you like structured courses more.

The course follows the grammar and vocabulary requirements according to the TORFL (ТРКИ) levels.

pro_course_detail.title: [30, 45, 55, 85min lessons] Russian Conversation Practice and Feedback A1 - C2
pro_course_detail.description:
Hello, language learners!! Доброго времени суток!! 

This course is for students who want to practice their Russian with a native speaker and receive professional feedback on their mistakes.
During the lesson we will use a Google document, where I will write down all of your mistakes and at the end of the lesson we will go over them and correct them.

Please, note the 60 min lesson length is 55 minutes. Structured grammar explanation, rules of reading and homework assignments are not included in this course. I will correct your grammar mistakes, however If you would like me to teach you grammar rules, please, consider taking my Russian A1 - C2 course.
До встречи на уроках! :)

teacher_info.intro: Позитивный и терпеливый человек, люблю объяснять всё непонятое простыми словами. Играю на фортепиано, рисую наброски, много читаю и путешествую.
teacher_info.about_me: Позитивный и терпеливый человек, люблю объяснять всё непонятое простыми словами. Играю на фортепиано, рисую наброски, много читаю и путешествую.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Обучаю русскому языку от нуля до свободного говорения (уровни А - С2).  Преподаю 6 лет, работаю со студентами из разных стран - от Европы (Великобритания, Франция, Македония), стран востока (Сирия, Палестина, Афганистан, Иран, Ирак), стран азии (Китай, Корея) до стран Латинской америки (Венесуэла, Перу, Эквадор, Гаити) и Африки (Конго, Алжир, Ангола). Всегда интересно узнавать что-то новое.
teacher_info.teaching_style: На уроках мы будем много говорить, повторять грамматику, узнавать о культуре России. Если у ученика есть тема, которую он хочет изучить специально, то желательно сообщить мне заранее, чтобы я могла подготовить материалы для урока. Для этого использую тексты, картинки, видео, учебники (по желанию). Для меня важно, чтобы ученик не боялся ошибаться, главное - говорить. Важно выполнять все домашнее задание, которое я даю. Это поможет закрепить новые знания. Урок идёт 90 минут. В него входит проверка домашнего задания, вопросы ученика, новый материал, разбор темы, практика говорения, повторение и закрепление. Levels A1-C2.

teacher_info.introduction: Привет! Меня зовут Юлия и я говорю по-русски всю свою жизнь. Давайте изучать этот прекрасный язык! "Ученье — свет, а неученье — тьма!" +++Get a 5 lesson package for 35.00$!+++ -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------> Hello! My name is Yuliya and I've spoken Russian for my entire life. I love my language and I am ready to be the person who is going to help you discover new things in the Russian language and make you realize that this language is EASY. I do translations (EN - RU, RU - EN), I write essays/make corrections on your essays. AN UPDATE! English lessons for Russian speakers! АНГЛИЙСКИЙ для РУССКОГОВОРЯЩИХ! 5 уроков (60 мин) = 35.00$. -английский для взрослых (все уровни) Whether you are a beginner in the Russian language or you are really good at it - I can always teach you something you never heard of. You might also need me: *If you are lost, and don't know what to start with, or how to keep studying the Russian language, I am here to help you. *If you need help with grammar/essay/questions that make you suffer from insomnia - hit me up. *If you have any questions about my lessons, just send me a message for more details. My teaching method: - We define your level; - You get the materials prepared for your level and interests; - During the lessons we TALK, SING and SHARE ideas; - We learn grammar step by step, I am able to make things clear to You; - I LOVE discussing grammar and culture, so if that interests you - try me! - During the first lesson (or the trial lesson) we will pick a structured course for you to make sure you feel comfortable and interested during the sessions! - You get the homework almost every lesson. - You get feedback after every lesson. - We repeat what you have learned so you won't forget the new things we studied together. - Most importantly! I am always open to suggestions. Увидимся на наших уроках! ***24 hours cancellation policy!*** Let's respect each other's plans!

pro_course_detail.title: 🟣 Русский для всех/Russian for everyone
pro_course_detail.description:
Russian classes for all levels! Alphabet, handwriting skills, phrases and idioms, practical vocabulary, grammar for all levels, reading, pronunciation, homework.
Either a beginner or an experienced learner - let me guide you through the beautiful Russian language! 💟

Мы можем говорить по-русски, по-English, или даже по-Español . 😉 Всё зависит от твоего уровня русского. 

🧩 The style of every class will depend on your preferences, moods, personality, interests, questions you ask me, etc. I will try to tailor the class as much as possible to you.

pro_course_detail.title: 🔵 Grammar is the heart ♥ of any language. "Grammar-based learning" course.
pro_course_detail.description:
I am a certified CELTA teacher, and I provide professional teaching to students of all levels (from A1 to C1). I am willing to teach you any grammar to make your speech grammatically correct in this course. Believe it or not, grammar is the heart of any language. 

Why should you choose this course?
• 1. You study ONLY what you need starting from the very first class. I will find a suitable grammar topic based on your talk and only on what you said.
‖ 2. It's suitable for ANY level out there. We need grammar in every sentence we say, even in the basic "My name is Julia". Don't hesitate to take this course even if you're level A1. I'll help you to start speaking.
֎ 3. It's not boring. Grammar learning doesn't have to be boring. My main goal is to see you actually GOT IT, and you can apply it in your daily conversation with English speakers. 

Start speaking better after the 1st class! ✔️

pro_course_detail.title: ⚪ Ukrainian language (with optional requests)* 🇺🇦
pro_course_detail.description: The Ukrainian language is spoken by 35 million people worldwide; this language is rich with historical and cultural moments. Ukrainian and Russian is NOT the same language, but they are similar since they are both languages of the Slavic language group. This course of Ukrainian language is a general course from the native speaker (me) to help you start speaking the Ukrainian language. Mainly we focus on speaking skills, from time to time I will have to teach you some grammar. In our classes, we will learn through conversation.

pro_course_detail.title: ✈️ Tourist English/ Practical English 🗽
pro_course_detail.description:
Lessons in this course are based on a video story about two office workers. Each class is different and is aimed to teach you practical English for everyday situations. If you want to know how to order lunch 🍔, talk on the phone 📱, invite someone to a party 🥳, and things like that - this is the right course for you. 

45 and 60-minute classes are available.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
Основная проблема изучающих любой язык – понимать на слух, говорить и не бояться делать ошибки. На своих уроках я уделяю большое внимание говорению и аудированию, ведь это лучший способ выучить язык и увеличить активный словарный запас.  Я помогу разобраться со значениями слов, подобрать правильное слово. Большую часть урока будете говорить вы на интересующие темы. 
The main problem of students of any language is to understand by ear, speak and not be afraid to make mistakes.  I pay great attention to speaking and listening, because this is the best way to learn a a language and increase an active vocabulary. You will talk most of the lesson on topics that interest you.

teacher_info.intro: Hi! My name is Evgeniya. I have been teaching Russian for 15 years, and I have been working online with individual students and groups for 5 years. I had 2,800 lessons here. My students live all over the world: in America, in Brazil, in Finland, in Austria, in England, and in Spain, in Singapore, and in Japan.
teacher_info.introduction: My name is Evgeniya. Almost 15 years I’m teaching Russian both online and offline. I love the students who know well their  goal. Would you like to speak fluent Russian in 100 hours? Would you like to pass TRKI-2 in 3 months? Or you would like just to surprise your Russian speaking parents-in-law? We’ll not waste time to learn the Russian language in general. I’ll help you to learn your Russian through select crucial grammar,  vocabulary  and communicative strategies which suits your goal and help you to get it in the period of time you are ready to dedicate to the Russian language. Are you ready? Well, let’s start!
teacher_info.about_me: Hi! My name is Evgeniya. I have been teaching Russian for 15 years, and I have been working online with individual students and groups for 5 years. I had 2,800 lessons here. My students live all over the world: in America, in Brazil, in Finland, in Austria, in England, and in Spain, in Singapore, and in Japan.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I know Russian is not an easy language to learn, but I also know why many people do prefer to learn Russian. For me, Russian is not just about vocabulary and grammar, listening, and essays. The Russian language is huge geography, a great history, great literature, a multi-ethnic population, a variety of traditions, and surprisingly rich culture. I invite you not just to learn Russian, but to get acquainted with the country and peoples living in Russia, learn how to speak, work, make friends, love, and meet guests in Russia.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
- Choose the "General Russian" package if you want to learn Russian from the very beginning or eager to improve your current skills. 
- If you want to learn more about the geography of Russia (How it influences the character, language, and identity) and take a virtual trip, choose "Traveler's diary". 
- If you want to learn how to ask questions, express your emotions, and participate in conversations with Russian people, choose "Ask Russians in Russian". 
- If you want to speak Russian quickly and confidently, choose the "Reality-show". 

I'm waiting for you in class! Russian is not just something to learn, let's try to taste what it means to live, think, and communicate in Russian.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
The General Russian package is a communicative course of the Russian language for complete beginners and students from A1 till B1 level.

The course includes conversational practice with grammar drills, vocabulary expanding, and improving reading and listening skills.

Two lessons per week (min) are recommended.

pro_course_detail.title: Traveler's Diary
pro_course_detail.description:
In this course, we will learn Russian and at the same time keep a traveler's diary in which we will plan our trip and fantasize in Russian about how it could take place. We will explore such cities as Moscow, St.Petersburg, Kazan, Sochi, Vladivostok, Karelia, the cities of the Golden Ring, and the Trans-Siberian Railway.

Each lesson will include a conversation about the city's peculiarities, problems, and life, mastering reading and listening skills, after the lesson you should write a diary entry where you will practice vocabulary and grammar issues from the lesson we have before.


The course are recommended for A2+ students.

pro_course_detail.title: Ask a question in Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
If you imagine a classic foreign language lesson, then, of course, the teacher will be an active questioner in the lesson. The student plays a passive role by answering the suggested questions. The higher the language level, the easier it is to formulate a question/series of questions, and Vice versa the lower the level, the more difficult it is to come up with at least one question for the text, for the picture, for the teacher, for the partner. If you want to develop the skill to ask the right and interesting questions, learn to be a discussion leader, this course is for you! Note the difference in content for different levels:
A1 (20 hours): Questions about images and adapted texts.
A2 (20 hours): Questions about the trailer and unadapted texts
B1 (20 hours): Questions to film episodes, media materials; comparison of two points of view, and convincing participation in the discussion.
B2 (20 hours): Debate in Russian. The skill of active listening and effective questioning. Defending your point of view. Refutation of someone else's opinion.

If there are students of the same level, we organize an online-debate or Pecha-Kucha night in Russian 2 times a month.

pro_course_detail.title: Beginner's Russian
pro_course_detail.description: If you only start learning Russian, it will be easier and take shorter period of time to learn it with the high-qualified teacher. You can expect exciting lessons designed specifically for reaching your goals,communicative method, friendly atmosphere and unlimited email support in between the sessions.

pro_course_detail.title: Exams preparation (ТРКИ, TORFL, GCSE, A-level Russian)
pro_course_detail.description:
Prepare for your exams with a certified examiner! I received a certificate of Russian examiner to better understand the both sides: I understand the feelings and the problems of a student as well as examiners' requirements. 
Book a lesson with me, and let's make the preparational process easy and interactive!

pro_course_detail.title: Bussiness Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
These lessons are aimed at entrepreneurs and managers working or planning to do business with Russia, and interested in improving their communication skills in the Russian language.
If your goal is negotiating, sending business e-mails, comprehending the contracts you sign, feel free to book a lesson with me and let's start practing!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian literature
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's explore Russian masterpieces at all levels-characters, plots, scenes, and genres!
This course is for those who like Russian culture and for those who know nothing about it. You can choose your adventure route with the poets and writers of the Golden Age, Silver Age of the Russian literature or Soviet and Modern Russian writers and poets.

teacher_info.intro: Я Медина. У меня 2 родных языка: русский и карачаевский. Готова помочь тебе в изучении языка. Сама я сейчас изучаю английский язык и знаю как важна разговорная практика с носителем языка.
teacher_info.about_me: Я Медина. У меня 2 родных языка: русский и карачаевский. Готова помочь тебе в изучении языка. Сама я сейчас изучаю английский язык и знаю как важна разговорная практика с носителем языка.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Я буду рада помочь тебе в достижении твоей цели - изучить русский язык. После нашего пробного занятия мы вместе составим твой план изучения языка учитывая твой уровень знания языка.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Мне важно поддерживать непринуждённую атмосферу и создавать хорошее настроение во время разговора. В зависимости от запроса ученика я выстраиваю занятие таким образом, чтобы извлечь из него максимальную пользу. Если я понимаю, что человеку тяжело без визуального сопровождения, то мы будем использовать презентации, если кто-то хочет улучшить свои знания в определённой сфере языка, то я буду подбирать материал, который в этом поможет.

I can also help you with understanding of the text, video, audio or problems with getting cultural insights you've selected in advance. I am able to correct your grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation and fluency.

Я ценю разговорные навыки в обучении, потому что главная цель - живое общение с носителями языка. Я могу помочь вам с пониманием текстов, видео, аудио, культурных особенностей общения, или вести живой диалог, в процессе которого отвечать на возникающие вопросы.

course_info.trial_description:
During the trial session, we will get to know each other and define your goals and plans on Russian language.  It's important for me to learn about your interests and hobbies so that our lessons are as interesting and useful as possible.

На пробном занятии мы с вами познакомимся получше, вы расскажете о своих целях и планах на русский язык. Для меня важно узнать о ваших интересах и хобби, чтобы наши уроки были максимально интересными и полезными для вас :)

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
If you are not sure about your Russian level you can book a 30-minute lesson so we get to know each other and determine the plan for further lessons. 
*****************
This course is for A2+ levels. 
There are two options for this lesson:
- discussion on specific topics
- spontaneous talk
- game "what would you do if"
- debates on various topics
We can choose a topic in advance or discuss anything that is relevant to you. You can also prepare some materials, words (including slang) the meaning of which is not clear to you or the difference in speech usage may seem confusing. 
During the lesson i will correct your word choice and grammar to to make your speech sound better.
After the lesson I will send you a google document with new words, their transcription and examples of using (from our lesson for better memorising).

Всем привет!
Этот курс рассчитан на уровень владения языком А2 и выше.
Есть два варианта этого урока:
- разговор на определенную тему
- живой диалог (спонтанный разговор)
- игра "что бы ты сделал, если"
- дебаты на разные темы
Мы можем выбрать тему заранее или обсудить что-то интересное вам. Вы также можете заранее подготовить материалы (тексты, упражнения, фразы и т.д.), слова (в том числе и сленг), значение которых вам не очень понятно или вы не видите разницу в их употреблении. 
Во время урока я буду исправлять ваши лексические и грамматические ошибки, чтобы ваша речь была более беглой и грамотной.
После урока я пришлю вам гугл-документ с новыми словами, их переводом и примерами использования (на основе нашего урока, чтобы вы лучше запомнили).

pro_course_detail.title: Let’s learn some fancy words (details in the description)
pro_course_detail.description:
Let’s learn some fancy words
-------------
30-minute lesson is supposed to be a trial lesson.
Recommended lesson duration - 45 minutes.
-----------------
This course is for A2+ levels
There are 4 available options:
1.	This lesson can be fully entertaining because we will learn some words that have no sense at the first blush/obscure etymology or get acquainted with Russian pun-based jokes :)
2.	The most filled course where we will get acquainted with more than 250 most common Russian slang words in context (memes, images, texts, videos). Recommended duration of course is 15-20 lessons.
3.	I will give you new advanced meanings and combinations of basic words and polysemantic ones so you will be able to express more with almost no learning of new words.
4.	We can deepen your knowledge of vocabulary in topic you prefer (you’ll need to determine the topic before taking a lesson).

If you have your own ideas of vocabulary lessons you can write me :)
Этот курс подойдет для учеников с уровнем А2+
Есть 4 вида урока:
1.	Развлекательный урок, на котором вы узнаете шутки-каламбуры с игрой слов на русском языке или выучите слова со странной непонятной этимологией :)
2.	Самый насыщенный курс, на котором мы выучим с вами более чем 250 слэнговых слов русского языка в контексте (мемы, картинки, тексты, истории, видео) за весь курс. Рекомендуемая продолжительность курса 15-20 уроков.
3.	Мы выучим новые продвинутые значения и сочетания базовых слов и многозначные слова, что поможет вам выражать мысли почти без изучения новой лексики.
4.	Мы углубим ваше знание слов в темах, которые вы выберете (нужно определить тему до бронирования урока).
Также вы можете предложить свои идеи по поводу форматов и контента уроков :)

По личному опыту я обнаружила, что самый приятный и эффективный способ выучить язык - это общение. Во время разговора я смогу помочь вам исправить ошибки.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello! My name is Andrei, and I'm a professional theater director and educator from Saint-Petersburg, Russia. I teach theater all over the world - in Europe and the USA, and I teach Russian online for anyone who studies Russian and loves Russian culture.

No less than Russian, I love English, which allows me to communicate with the world. In 2018, I won a Fulbright competition and as a Visiting Scholar I taught Russian theater techniques at two American universities - The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and The University of Illinois at Chicago. This experience helped me improve my spoken English and convinced me that language is a powerful tool for cultural exchange.
teacher_info.short_signature: I'm a patient teacher and a passionate learner
teacher_info.introduction:
Hello! I'm a theater director and writer. One of my hobbies is learning languages. I truly love Russian literature and language and have loved them since my school years passed. In my professional career I deal with them almost every day, and I really like to spread my knowledge. Studying Russian with me, you can ask not only about the grammar, rules or pronunciation of the language, but also about Russian culture, myths and history. My interest in Russian extends even to slang. In my tutoring I use a wide range of materials, beginning with the famous Soviet cartoons and ending with modern Russian textbooks. I came up with my own technique to provoke speech from those students who have strong psychological barrier and are always shy to speak. We can choose several topics, which you want to be worked out, as well as just freely communicate. If you have time for self-study, I will prepare individual exercises for your homework. 
I’d also be pleased to teach children, using my experience in teaching language through theatrical games. These lessons can be funny and entertaining.
So, let me know your needs and difficulties... And let's get started!
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello! My name is Andrei, and I'm a professional theater director and educator from Saint-Petersburg, Russia. I teach theater all over the world - in Europe and the USA, and I teach Russian online for anyone who studies Russian and loves Russian culture.

No less than Russian, I love English, which allows me to communicate with the world. In 2018, I won a Fulbright competition and as a Visiting Scholar I taught Russian theater techniques at two American universities - The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and The University of Illinois at Chicago. This experience helped me improve my spoken English and convinced me that language is a powerful tool for cultural exchange.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
As a tutor, I've been teaching Russian online for about 3 years. During this time I've taught around 50 students - from beginners to advanced. Among my students I have had an American military pilot, an American embassy officer in Kazakhstan, dozens of college students, and others. I've gained some experience in diagnosing student problems and finding effective tactics to improve their skills.
As a person who was trained a lot in voice and speech class during my studies in the Saint-Petersburg State Theater Arts Academy, I can also help you significantly improve your pronunciation.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I believe that it's not enough to learn grammar and vocabulary to master a foreign language. One has to be immersed into a real language, a language people really speak, which is always different from those versions we encounter in various textbooks. On the other hand, it seems important to me to show students higher examples of the Russian language.

I mainly rely on conversational practice. However, I strongly recommend students to listen to Russian speech using various podcasts, and I give them four special techniques for working with these types of materials. 

During my lessons I use various exercises, tables and games, as well as interviewing and retelling.

course_info.trial_description:
Book my trial lesson if you are not sure what tutor you really need, or if you have some doubts about online classes.
I'm looking forward to talking to you!

pro_course_detail.title: One-on-One Tutoring: Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is designed for those who would like to gradually improve all their Russian language skills, but who need a mentor to structure this process. 
During the lesson we will diagnose your abilities to speak, listen or write and then we will try to find the best strategy to improve them. Every next lesson can be discussed in accordance with the goals we set up for our progress.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is designed for those who have already mastered Russian to a level which allows them to communicate with people. 
If you are interested in improving your conversational skills, expanding vocabulary and growing your knowledge about Russian culture, life and language  - you are welcome to book it!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian in Exercises
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is designed for those who would like to improve their Russian grammar knowledge in all its aspects. During the lesson we will work on topics you have difficulties with, or we will pay attention to most complicated parts of Russian grammar  - its case system,  verbs of motion, verb aspects etc.
In addition to that, for those who strive to better their speaking skills, we can work on the nuances of Russian spelling and pronunciation.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика/ Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Разгворная практика на любые вас интересующие темы! 
Conversation practice in any topic, which is interesting for you!

pro_course_detail.title: Harjoitusta keskustellen/ Conversational Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Tällä tunnilla puhumme kaikesta, mistä sinä pidät! Voit päättää aiheen ja tulemme keskustelemaan siitä avoimesti. Voimme myös käydä tosielämän tilanteisiin liittyviä harjoituksia ja työstää peruslauserakennetta, sekä kielioppia. Pidän keskustelun aina yllä kysymällä lisää ja laajentamalla aihetta tarvittaessa. Koko tunnin ajan annan virheenkorjauksia ja rohkaisua. Näin toivottavasti menetät pelkosi suomenkielen käyttämisessä  ja tulet itsevarmemmaksi! Jokaisen tunnin lopussa annan sinulle palautetta siitä, missä olet onnistunut hyvin ja mitä voisit mahdollisesti vielä parantaa. 
En malta odottaa, että tapaamme pian!

In this class we will talk about anything you like! You can decide the topic and we have an open conversation about it. We can also have role-plays for real-life situations and work on basic sentence structure and grammar. I will make sure to always keep the conversation going by asking you more questions and expanding the topic if necessary. Throughout the class I will provide error correction and encouragement. This will hopefully allow you to lose your fears of speaking in Finnish and become more confident! At the end of each class, I will give you feedback on what you did well and what you can improve. Can't wait to meet you soon!

pro_course_detail.title: Luemme yhdessä / Reading together
pro_course_detail.description:
Nopea tapa parantaa suomen kielenkäyttöäsi on lukeminen! Autan sinua valitsemaan mielenkiintoisen kirjan luettavaksi yhdessä tunnillamme. Luemme vuorotellen ääneen, jotta voit kuunnella ja harjoitella oikeaa suomen kielen ääntämistä. 
LISÄÄ SANAVARASTOASI NOPEASTI: Selitän uusien sanojen merkityksen lukemisen aikana, jotta lukeminen on sujuvaa. Opit uusia sanoja erittäin nopeasti, koska opit ne tarinan yhteydessä ja koska näet sanat toistuvasti. Kielitutkimuksen mukaan uutta sanastoa oppii lukemalla monta kertaa nopeammin, kuin perinteisiä menetelmiä käyttämällä.

Reading for pleasure is fast way to improve your Finnish! I will help you to select an interesting book to read together in class. We will take turns reading out loud so you can listen to and practice correct Finnish pronunciation. 
INCREASE YOUR VOCABULARY RAPIDLY: I will explain the meaning of new vocabulary words. You will learn new words very quickly because you are learning in the context of a story and because you will see the words repeated. Language research says you will learn new vocabulary multiple times faster by reading, than by using traditional methods.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello! My name is Evgeny (Eugene), I am from Russia, Moscow. I've graduated from Moscow State Linguistic University, German Faculty, Theology Department. At the university I was learning five languages: English and German, Ancient Greek, Latin and Church-Slavonic. I am fluent in English and German, but German is my main professional field. I work as an interpreter and have been teaching German professionally for more than 7 years. 

I am also a theologian, a practicing Orthodox Christian. I love speaking about religion and philosophy. I offer classes in Russian, English and German for all levels, whether you are a complete beginner or an advanced learner in search of perfection.
teacher_info.about_me:

At the university I was learning five languages: English and German, Ancient Greek, Latin and Church-Slavonic. I am fluent in English and German, but German is my main professional field. I am also a theologian, a practicing Orthodox Christian. I love speaking about religion and philosophy. I offer classes in Russian, English and German for all levels, whether you are a complete beginner or an advanced learner in search of perfection.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
People usually say I am patient, open-minded, kind and optimistic. I love having deep, inspiring conversations, love learning from people and listening to their stories. I think that every human live is unique, precious and truly awesome in the original sense of this word — inspiring awe. 

I offer speaking practice in Russian, English and German. Russian is my native language, I was born and live since childhood in Moscow, I have very standard Russian with classic Moscow pronunciation and vocabulary. I am perfectly fluent in English and German. I don't "feel" these languages as good as I feel Russian, but I know German and English grammar through and through due to my university background.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Most often people who take lessons with me have an intermediate level of the target language, and want speaking practice! That's why it's my priority number one! In my lessons I guarantee that you will SPEAK A LOT! =) We will speak about two main topics: 
- FIRST, about your daily life. I want my pupils to speak fluently about their job, hobbies, the food they eat, about their friends and family, interesting events in life, about their favourite books, movies, games and so on... 
- SECOND, about your main professional field or about your main point of interest. Are you a doctor? an architect? a theologian? a biology student? a parent? We will discuss articles / videos / podcasts about it.

exp_info.description: I had a privilege to teach at the best linguistic university in Russia. That experience gave me a lot and was a perfect starting point of my teaching career.

exp_info.company: Saint Tikhon's Orthodox University of Humanities

edu_info.description: theology with a considerable emphasis on linguistics and interpretation

cert_info.certificate: Interpreter in the field of professional communication

course_info.trial_description: During the trial lesson we get to know each other. I ask you a lot of different questions, because my goal is to figure out a good strategy for our future language learning curriculum that would revolve around your needs. If you have time, try to get ready beforehand and answer following questions: When did you start learning your target language? How did you learn it? What do you like / dislike about the way you learn it? Why do you want to learn this language? What other languages do you speak? What is your profession? What are your main hobbies?

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description: General Russian language tutoring, adjusted for your specific needs. I accept pupils with any level, total beginners and advanced pupils. My style of teaching is rather informal and conversational, then academic and rigidly structured, but I don't neglect diving into tricky Russian grammar =)

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Practice in German
pro_course_detail.description: In the lesson we are going to speak a lot! In the beginning I will define you level, we will set our goals and start working towards them. The topics we can speak about can be very different: from daily routine and "kitchen German" to discussing various humanitarian fields such as history, philosophy or theology.

pro_course_detail.title: German B1-C1 (working with Youtube videos, podcasts, articles)
pro_course_detail.description: Improve your German using authentic materials and speaking about the topics that are most compelling to you! To each lesson I will give you a link to a video, a podcast or a text that is related to the topic that you are interested in, I'll send you a PDF file with the questions to the chosen material. During the class I will try to make you speak as much as possible. I'll carefully correct all your mistakes without interrupting you and in the end you will get a list of all the vocabulary units you have to revise to our next class.

pro_course_detail.title: German B1-C1 (reading books)
pro_course_detail.description: We choose a book in German and read it together. I help you translate difficult passages, we discuss the contents of the book, you write short summaries after each unit and I correct them. Reading / listening to an interesting book is a perfect way to enrich and deepen your knowledge of a foreign language.

pro_course_detail.title: German A1-B1 (for Russian students)
pro_course_detail.description: Курс построен, по большей части, на учебнике Zeit für Deutsch 1.1-2, по которому занимаются студенты МГЛУ (бывший ИИЯ им. Мориса Тореза) на первом курсе. Работаю с ним уже несколько лет, он зарекомендовал себя, как очень хорошее пособие для начинающих.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal tutoring in English
pro_course_detail.description: General English lessons. Conversational practice, grammar, reading and more. Informal way of teaching.

teacher_info.intro: Hey! I'm Viktoriia, and I'm from Ukraine. Right after high school, I entered university in Lithuania. It was my first experience living and studying abroad. I graduated in 2016 and hold a Bachelor's degree in English Philology. This experience increased my interest in traveling and improved my English skills, and I decided to participate in the WorkandTravel program for students. I went to the US and spent five months there working and traveling. After the US, I had a chance to come to Spain and complete the Advanced TEFL Certification Program. I fell in love with this country and decided to come back to obtain a Master's degree in Advanced English.
teacher_info.introduction: I graduated in 2016, from LCC International University, Lithuania and hold a Bachelor’s degree in English Philology. The four year undergraduate program in English Language and Literature formed the basis of my persistence towards achieving an in-depth knowledge in the field of English Philology. During my bachelor studies, I underwent the experience of teaching English as a second language. Under the supervision of professor along with my colleague I have completed TESOL practicum. I was working as English teacher at school and at Lithuanian Labor Exchange. This experience increased my interest in teaching and I decided to connect my future career with teaching English language, wishing to become a professional teacher. In order achieve this aim, I constructed a plan which included some objectives: enter the university for Master`s degree in English Studies and get TEFL certification. Last year, I had a chance to come to Valencia and complete Advanced TEFL Certification Program. I have been impressed by the beauty and culture of Valencia, and it inspired me to learn Spanish language. I spent much time searching for universities, and at last I chose the University of Valencia among other universities of Europe. I was working with students of different age and different level of English language. It is important for me to identify what my students` gloals are and what teaching methods work the best in these cases. If you want to be my student, be ready for interesting and fun activities that will help you to improve your language skills.
teacher_info.about_me: Hey! I'm Viktoriia, and I'm from Ukraine. Right after high school, I entered university in Lithuania. It was my first experience living and studying abroad. I went to the US and spent five months there working and traveling. After the US, I had a chance to come to Spain and complete the Advanced TEFL Certification Program. I fell in love with this country and decided to come back to obtain a Master's degree in Advanced English.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I can say that I have vast experience teaching languages and working with people from various parts of the world. I have worked as a teacher since 2016 and taught students at different places, such as schools and language courses. I have been an online tutor for more than four years, and I can say for sure what my students need and how I can help them.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I adapt the materials according to my student's goals and needs. The communicative approach is the most effective for language learning since it helps learners acquire the language through interaction. Thus, I often use activities that allow my students to communicate, share their ideas and thoughts. If you are shy to speak in English or very unconfident in your speech, I can help you eliminate these fears!

exp_info.description: I was an English teacher at WinWin Cambridge Educational Center in Zhytomyr, Ukraine. I was teaching kids and adults following CELTA instructions. The length of the lesson was one hour or half an hour.
Completed Advanced TEFL Certification Programme in Valencia, Spain.140 hours of TEFL theory course and 500 hours of teaching practice.
